relics.name: Placebo
relics.flavorText: I swear, it really changes things.

relics.name: Amulet Fragment
relics.description: Whenever you remove a card from your deck, raise your Max HP by 5.
relics.flavorText: This tiny shattered fragment still glows with a faint light.

relics.name: Blessed Leaf
relics.description: At the start of combat, deal 2 damage to a random enemy for each Attack in your deck.
relics.flavorText: A leaf of the sacred Lun Tree.

relics.name: Counterfeit Coin
relics.description: At the start of combat, shuffle a copy of all your Rare cards into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Don't get it mixed up with the real thing.

relics.name: Sock Puppet
relics.description: Whenever you draw an Unplayable card, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: His name is Lord Ultraviolence the Second.

relics.name: Scissors
relics.description: Your Attack cards deal additional damage equal to the number of other Attack cards in your hand.
relics.flavorText: What a strange design for a weapon.

relics.name: Triangle
relics.description: The first Attack, Skill, and Power card you play each combat cost 0.

relics.name: Dreaming Stone
relics.description: Every 3 turns, use the top 10 cards of your draw pile as your hand.
relics.flavorText: Keep it under your pillow, and you might finally remember your dreams.

relics.name: Miniature Pagoda
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You cannot draw more than 9 cards each turn.
relics.flavorText: Nine is the limit; to go higher is defiance.

relics.name: Sending Bell
relics.description: Combats drop an additional Curse card reward. Whenever you obtain a Curse, obtain a random relic.
relics.flavorText: Ring it thrice, in memory of those you have seen away.

relics.name: Voice Box
relics.description: Your cards are played in pairs. The second card will use the first card's damage and Block.
relics.flavorText: It records and repeats and records and repeats the sounds around the sounds around it.

relics.name: Owl Charm
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Power card, transform it into a random card and reduce its cost to 0 for the combat.
relics.flavorText: A sigil of those seeking a different form of power.

mods.name: Normal Relics
mods.description: A small collection of completely normal relics.
